pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit, Simulate and Diagnose Exponential-Family Models for Networks // An integrated set of tools to analyze and simulate networks based on exponential-family random graph models (ERGMs). 'ergm' is a part of the Statnet suite of packages for network analysis. See Hunter, Handcock, Butts, Goodreau, and Morris (2008) doi:10.18637/jss.v024.i03 and Krivitsky, Hunter, Morris, and Klumb (2021) arXiv:2106.04997.
